elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Explain the following terms from the factual text.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Social networks
elements.correctAnswer: Social networks are platforms that allow users to create a personal profile and network with others as well as share content, messages, photos and videos.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Microblogs
elements.correctAnswer: On microblogs, users can post short text messages or contributions that can be read, commented on and shared by others.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Photo-video sharing
elements.correctAnswer: Here, users upload photos and videos to a platform that other users can see, comment on and like.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Instant messaging
elements.correctAnswer: Instant messaging allows users to quickly exchange private messages, photos and videos.
